jobDescription: Chief Data Scientist  If you are a Chief Data Scientist with experience, please read on!  In the heart of Silicon Valley we're introducing AI & Machine Learning to help kids learn how to read. We understand reading is one of the foundational cores to learning so we decided to create a spin-out from the most successful Learning Technology company. Our founders have a significant history of successful start-ups and we're also backed by our very strong funding . Leveraging over 15+yrs of Artificial Intelligence from a top Ivy League AI Lab we're putting together software that will change the way kids read forever!!  If you're passionate about pushing limits for education using advanced technology - let's chat! What You Will Be Doing
